title: Worst experience ever

text: Was attending a music event in the weekend and was famishing as the event dragged on till late night. Myself and wife wanted a proper Thai dining and wanted to try Nara for sometime.Had a bit of an issue in parking as there were only a few spots but managed to park on the street as the city life is slowing down on late weekend.Ambiance was great for a Thai dine-in as it had all the lighting and building materials right that signified/screamed a Thai look. Was impressed at the welcome desk as they checked in and escorted us to a quiet table with the right temperature as we wouldn’t want to sit on a table freezing or too hot through out the meal.Assistants were helpful and quick but recommend you know the dishes before going in as they recommend the dishes that are on the list as it is “Nara recommended” and does not give a personal touch as to what they would know as the best..Ordering was not a hazel and the dishes came in quicker than expected which was delightful.I need to commend on the colors that was used on dishes and drinks as they had shades from Purple, orange, yellow, green etc. which enhanced the dining experience.Unfortunately the food tasted more towards a single pallet which gave more sweetness than a blend of tastes. It could have been due to wrong combination of selections but then the menu was not giving out proper information.Would recommend that Nara staff is more updated on the dishes and can give real time information on the dishes and to up the ante on the taste and they were more towards a sweeter and bland side of the pallet.Will visit again after some time to see how they have updated.
title: Not up to expectations

text: This is my 2nd visit to nara ifthar buffet.it's simply the best thai buffet in town.the real authentic range of food prepared by the thai chef.the restaurant house full by 6pm. They got enough space of car parking facility as well.the staff is very friendly and they knows how to handle a huge crowd. The manager goes to each table to check customers satisfaction. Definitely worth for money.I will recommend this restaurant for everyone.
title: Complete thai meal

text: Last week I visited to this place with my friends. Buffet was excellent, lots of variety of foods. Price also very reasonable. Separate area for players. Recomonded this place to others.
title: Ifthar Buffet

text: I’ve eaten at several of their outlets overseas, but was unimpressed with our meal in Colombo. We ordered a watermelon juice and it looked and tasted off. They were nice enough to bring a second one. The red curry chicken was flavorful, but there was very little chicken and no vegetables to pair with. I ordered Pad See Ew, which is usually a flat noodle dish. However I got thin rice noodles. When I asked they said they only served flat noodles if requested, though the photograph showed the dish with flat noodles. The dish was not tasty, the noodles were lumpy, there was no sauté, and the prawns looked like they had been boiled and placed on the dish. The staff were very helpful and attentive. All in all, a very disappointing lunch at a comparatively steep price.
title: Disappointed

text: The ifthar buffet was excellent selection of food at reasonable price ,I would recommend management to have this buffet after Ramadan on weekends onlyAs there very few halal restaurant with buffets on ordinary days , the ambience is excellent and staff are goodParking is available in plenty
